title: All Ball - NBA Agent Todd Ramasar on Representing Baron Davis, Pascal Siakam and Negotiating Against Isiah Thomas
itunes:title: All Ball - NBA Agent Todd Ramasar on Representing Baron Davis, Pascal Siakam and Negotiating Against Isiah Thomas
description:
In this episode, Doug is joined by agent Todd Ramasar discusses his hoops upbringing in inland Southern California, why he chose to walk on at UCLA, the surprising way he ended up representing Baron Davis, what sold him about an unknown Pascal Siakam, what it was like negotiating against Isiah Thomas as an inexperienced young agent, and his plans over the next decade. Make sure you download, rate and subscribe here to get the latest All Ball Podcasts!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
